name: The Worm (itch) (Adrien Manigne)
description:
The Worm is a 2D game were a giant worm races you but he will always catch you no matter how fast you go and how intelligent you are death will always catch you. it was made for the Ludum Dare 2022 on the 03/04/22 with Adrien manigne,Nathan Arthur,Safir, Elie Rouach and the wonderful team of Magic Makers France

All right reserved to us all made by us

Enjoy
